斑.definition: spot; colored patch; stripe; spotted; striped; variegated

斑剝.definition: mottled and peeling off in places

斑喉希鶥.definition: (bird species of China) bar-throated minla (Actinodura strigula)

斑嘴鴨.definition: (bird species of China) eastern spot-billed duck (Anas zonorhyncha)

斑文鳥.definition: (bird species of China) scaly-breasted munia (Lonchura punctulata)

斑羚.definition: Nemorhaedus goral, a species of antelope found in Xinjiang
